bgColorPrimary.name: Primary Background Color
bgColorPrimary.hint:
Primary color for background gradient (hex format)
Default is: #667eea

bgColorSecondary.name: Secondary Background Color
bgColorSecondary.hint:
Secondary color for background gradient (hex format)
Default is: #764ba2

textColor.name: Text Color
textColor.hint:
Main text color (hex format)
Default is: #ffffff

accentColor.name: Buttons Color
accentColor.hint:
Buttons and highlights color (hex format)
Default is: #FF6B6B

settings.youtube-sync.rememberVolume.name: Remember Volume
settings.youtube-sync.rememberVolume.hint: Remember the last volume setting and restore it when opening a new video
